mapper.select: SELECT func_id, level, func_model_name, parent_id, sys_func_id, field1, field2 FROM func_model where sys_func_id=#{sysFuncId} AND parent_id=#{parentId} AND is_del = 0
SELECT fm.func_id, fm.level, fm.func_model_name, fm.parent_id, fm.sys_func_id, fm.field1, fm.field2, sm.sys_id, sm.sys_module_name FROM func_model fm JOIN sys_model sm ON fm.sys_func_id=sm.sys_id

SELECT fm.func_id, fm.level, fm.func_model_name, fm.parent_id,fm.sys_func_id, fm.field1, fm.field2, sm.sys_id, sm.sys_module_name FROM func_model fm JOIN sys_model sm ON fm.sys_func_id=sm.sys_id where fm.sys_func_id = #{sys_id} AND fm.is_del = 0
SELECT fm.func_id, fm.level, fm.func_model_name, fm.parent_id, fm.sys_func_id, fm.field1, fm.field2 FROM func_model fm where fm.func_id = #{func_id} AND fm.is_del = 0
SELECT func_id, level, func_model_name, parent_id, sys_func_id, field1, field2 FROM func_model where func_id != 0 and parent_id = 0 and is_del = 0

SELECT func_id, level, func_model_name, parent_id, sys_func_id, field1, field2, is_del FROM func_model where level = #{level} and func_model_name = #{func_model_name} and parent_id = #{parent_id} and sys_func_id = #{sys_func_id} and is_del = 0

SELECT func_id, level, func_model_name, parent_id, sys_func_id, field1, field2 FROM func_model where level = #{map.level} and parent_id = #{map.parentId} and sys_func_id = #{map.sysFuncId} and is_del = 0

SELECT func_id, level, func_model_name, parent_id, sys_func_id, field1, field2 FROM func_model where func_id = #{funcId} and is_del = 0
